description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 12 January 2024 (RN: 23/08381/FULL) for the: Alterations including: Removal of Reinforced Autoclaved Aerated Concrete (RAAC) from building; Infill of existing undercroft; re-cladding of building with new windows, roof and skylights; alterations to and removal of side ground floor infill to provide side access route; provision of green roof; installation of PV panels to roof; installation of replacement retractable canopy; erection of timber fence extension to western boundary. Namely, to allow update of the facade design; amendment of the ground floor west side storage; adjustments to window and external door sizes and positions; additional skylight to the classroom; updated position of the fixed metal ladder to the roof; updated PV layout to reflect manufacturer's design proposal; and M&E enclosure - internal pipe-work only, required because of limits of existing structure.
decision_conditions: Design ext appearance OK not in CA
Design ext appearance OK not in CA
